name: overexplicit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
more clear and exact than is necessary or helpful: The dialogue in this scene is over-explicit in a way that it is not in the rest of the film. The song makes over-explicit what would be more subtly expressed through metaphor.
showing or talking about sex, violence, etc. in a way that is too detailed : She accepts that some people think her costumes are overexplicit, but prefers the word 'sexy' to 'raunchy'. over-explicit TV documentaries about surgery
More examplesFewer examplesThe play was excessive and noisy, and everything in it was over-explicit.The critics complained that the overexplicit trailer told you more about the film than you wanted to know.over-explicit love scenes
